channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: Now that’s what I would call a positive sign! https://t.co/ZiMVV5TqG6
item.source:markdown: Now that’s what I would call a positive sign! https://t.co/ZiMVV5TqG6

item.description: I got a geo-targeted ad in podcast recently, and I have a pretty good idea of how it was done. I rarely listen to podcasts, and this makes me want to listen to them even less.
item.source:markdown: I got a geo-targeted ad in podcast recently, and I have a pretty good idea of how it was done. I rarely listen to podcasts, and this makes me want to listen to them even less.

item.description: I don’t know what I did to deserve it, but a woman looked me right in the eyes today.
item.source:markdown: I don’t know what I did to deserve it, but a woman looked me right in the eyes today.

item.description: How do I mute the “‘accidentally’ tweeting a single word” meme?
item.source:markdown: How do I mute the “‘accidentally’ tweeting a single word” meme?

item.description: I want the job of bossing people around with a megaphone while sitting on a high chair, but it looks like that one’s taken. https://t.co/5aMfgPuSZI
item.source:markdown: I want the job of bossing people around with a megaphone while sitting on a high chair, but it looks like that one’s taken. https://t.co/5aMfgPuSZI

item.description: Whenever someone on a video call wears an all-green shirt, I mentally fill in the area of their shirt with their background (real or virtual). And then the wallpaper scene from Garden State comes to mind. https://t.co/h5FrOCj6FS
item.source:markdown: Whenever someone on a video call wears an all-green shirt, I mentally fill in the area of their shirt with their background (real or virtual). And then the wallpaper scene from Garden State comes to mind. https://t.co/h5FrOCj6FS

item.description: @rtanglao The reason I looked up the boy choy pattern was because I saw someone wearing a Hawaiian shirt with a shirt with a pineapple pattern, and I was like “Come on, that’s way too obvious!” So yes, I would love for you to wear a mapo tofu or sinigang or adobo or pancit Hawaiian shirt.
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao The reason I looked up the boy choy pattern was because I saw someone wearing a Hawaiian shirt with a shirt with a pineapple pattern, and I was like “Come on, that’s way too obvious!” So yes, I would love for you to wear a mapo tofu or sinigang or adobo or pancit Hawaiian shirt.

item.description:
The edit button will be abused, in a way Twitter didn’t anticipate. https://t.co/Y34JIS1GAt

Aujourd’hui, nous sommes tous le bouton d’édition de Twitter.
item.source:markdown:
The edit button will be abused, in a way Twitter didn’t anticipate. https://t.co/Y34JIS1GAt
Aujourd’hui, nous sommes tous le bouton d’édition de Twitter.

item.description: @Twitter Nobody cares. Add an edit bu—Oh.
item.source:markdown: @Twitter Nobody cares. Add an edit bu—Oh.
